JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and ResponsibilitiesThe role would require you to develop sophisticated products that add value to the client and result in new projects and revenue streams.Requirements :- Expertise in react.js; ability to 'think in react'- 5+ years of experience on frontend JavaScript frameworks, including at least 2 years in React- Experience in developing complex user interfaces from scratch- Sound knowledge of engineering processes including source control, continuous integration, and deployment- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent- An opportunity to develop some of the best enterprise SaaS products to be built out of India- Opportunities to quench your thirst for problem-solving, experimenting, learning, and implementing innovative solutionsIt's immediate requirements; so early joiner will be highly recommended

EDUCATION.UG: B.Sc in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Computers, BCA in Computers
